label.string: The file must have 2 column keys: 'code' => for product reference 'quantity' => for product quantity

The file must have 2 column keys: 'code' => for product reference 'material' => for material reference And 1 or more column keys for attribute values. Column header is the attribute values, the row will be the quantity. E.g. if attribute are '15', '16' and '17', it needs to have 3 column: '15' => for product with attribute '15' quantity '16' => for product with attribute '16' quantity '17' => for product with attribute '17' quantity
